full_summary:
### Naufrage Basin Dredging

#### Government of Canada Tender Announcement

**Reference Number:** WS4153390178

**Publication Date:** August 18, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** September 6, 2023, 14:00:00

** Amendement Date:** August 25, 2023

**Contract Value:** TBA

**Tender Description:**
The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) has identified the need for a dredging project within the Naufrage Basin to address navigational issues. This project requires dredging services to improve waterway access and facilitate safe ship passing. The successful contractor must also dispose of dredged materials at an approved site. The Department has set an 8-week work completion timeline after award.

### Selection Criteria

* Lowest Price

### Tender Requirement

* Dredging services using a barge
* Disposal of dredged materials at an approved site
* Completion within an 8-week timeframe

### Additional Details

* This tender is an open competition, and all interested contractors are invited to submit their proposals.
* Proposals should be submitted electronically to Ariba Discovery.
* For technical and contractual questions, contact Richar Parsons at [richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

### Important Contact Information

* Richar Parsons, Contact for technical and contractual questions
* Email: [richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Additional Resources

* The official notice can be accessed at the [Ariba Discovery site](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17206398?extsite=MTcyMDYzOThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). 
Note: As per guidelines I have not included all government contact and contract details that were originally provided. You may consider adding them if you wish. Let me know.
